Loc.Value: Summons one of the following random creatures onto the battlefield: <align=left>{ICON:BulletPoint}Two fearsome War Bears</align> <align=left>{ICON:BulletPoint}A raging Boar</align> <align=left>{ICON:BulletPoint}A poison dealing Fat Rat</align>
Summons a pair of fearsome war bears onto the battlefield. Specialized in melee{ICON:MeleeIconNormal} combat and will obey the Wizard's command until death or banishment.
Summons a raging boar into battle. The boar is a formidable melee{ICON:MeleeIconNormal} fighter and can also Stun its enemy.
A rampaging boar called upon into combat by the most skillful boar tamers. The boar is a formidable melee{ICON:MeleeIconNormal} fighter and can also Stun its enemy.
Summons a poison dealing, fat rat into battle. Their bite will cause Bleeding and their ugly visage can Cause Fear in the enemy.
A fat rat is an unseemingly devious creature hailing from darker lands than even Myrror. Their bite will cause Bleeding and their ugly visage can Cause Fear in the enemy.
